entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. Temperature steady near minus 6.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
